name: The Backrooms (itch) (Jamie Marland) (Jamie Marland)
description:
You don't know how you got here but the occasional thump echos that you are not alone.

Find the key and exit to escape before your battery runs out and you are left in the dark.

Press Space to flash your camera and scare any unwelcome guests for a small cost of your battery.
Press Shift to crouch and become quieter.
Press R to restart.

Feedback: https://forms.gle/F2Ce9YpmyrHV73qh6
